mapper.select: select id, vehicle_distribution_name, vehicle_distribution_percentage from t_vehicle_distribution
select id, vehicle_type_name as vehicleTypeName, vehicle_type_percentage as vehicleTypePercentage from t_vehicle_type
select id, time_frame as timeFrame, date as date, vehicle_number as vehicleNumber from t_time_frame_number where date >= #{minDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and date <= #{maxDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}
select id, vehicle_type_name as vehicleTypeName, time_frame as timeFrame, vehicle_number as vehicleNumber from t_vehicle_type_number

select street_name as streetName, sum(passed_number) as passedNumber from t_vehicle_statistic where date >= #{minDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and date <= #{maxDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} group by street_name order by passedNumber desc limit 10

select region_name as regionName, sum(passed_number) as passedNumber from t_vehicle_statistic where date >= #{minDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and date <= #{maxDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} group by region_name order by passedNumber desc
select region_name as regionName from t_region where t_region.level = #{level}
select sum(today_passed_number) from t_vehicle_passed_number where date >= #{minDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and date <= #{maxDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}
